text: The 1956 Ottawa Rough Riders finished in 3rd place in the IRFU with a 7–7 record but lost to the Hamilton Tiger-Cats in the East Semi-Final. ==Preseason== {| class="wikitable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:black;color:red;" | Week || Date || Opponent || Score || Result || Record |- align="center" bgcolor="#ddffdd" | A || Aug 3 || vs. Saskatchewan Roughriders || 13–1 || Win || 1–0 |- align="center" bgcolor="#ddffdd" | B || Aug 10 || vs. Edmonton Eskimos || 33–13 || Win || 2–0 |} ==Regular season== ===Standings=== {| class="wikitable" |+ Interprovincial Rugby Football Union !
